I retired from csgo because it's now unplayable for me but now i have source so i'm much happier :)

Best Game.
Started playing this Game at 2009, and it's still on of the best Shooter-Game!

Was first introduced to CS over a decade ago by a close friend (who also happens to be a fellow Steam user), and have never gotten bored of it since. Played every CS there is, and Source is definiely the top of the list. 

If you're taking the time to read this review and have never given it a chance, please play it. At least once. I promise that you won't regret it!

O UNICO CS QUE APENAS JUNTOU FOR√áAS COM O 1.6(Graficos bonitos, jogabilidade MELHORADA e etc) ao inves de fazer igual ao CSGO ou que parece uma "copia" feita nas coxas mas com competitivo, workshop, skins, nerfs e Modifica√ßoes no som das armas(bem recentes por sinal).

- N√£o temos MM/Faceit/GamersClub mas quando alguem gira o ADMIN DA BAN.
- N√£o temos Workshop e nem "Skins", mas ainda sim temos mapas personalizados e skins que baixamos de gra√ßa pela internet.
- N√£o temos atualiza√ßoes de PESO, mas a "Nossa" Source(Engine usada SOMENTE no CS:S/TF2/DOD:S/HL2/HLDeathmatch/portal) ainda e Atualizada ate hoje com corre√ß√µes de bugs e ajustes.
- N√£o temos Overwatch, mas tambem e quase impossivel achar PROFETA ou alguem girando.

Mit indtryk er at mange enten sk√¶ver til 1.6 eller CS:GO. Mit f√∏rste spil i serien var ogs√• det f√∏rstn√¶vnte men det var f√∏rst med Source at det for alvor tog fart! 
Det her spil er for mig, grunden til at jeg fik Steam. Jeg skylder Source s√• utrolig meget og det var ogs√• en af de spil der fik mig skiftet over fra PS3 og tilbage til PC gaming igen. 
F√∏r det her, havde jeg hovedsageligt spillet singleplayer eller co-op spil og til n√∏ds online, hvis mine PS3 spil havde den mulighed. 
Gennem Source, opdagede jeg hvor fedt det kunne v√¶re at spille med andre og hvor sp√¶ndende det kan v√¶re at spille PvP. Det kunne samtidig pille ens ego ned, da man gik fra at v√¶re en krigsgud i singleplayer, til at opdage hvor meget bedre folk kan v√¶re online. 

Idag spiller jeg hellere CS:GO eller det helt klassiske, men mindet om det her st√•r stadig klart og tydeligt.

One of the best Counter-Strike games. Good sounds, good graphics, kinda strange physics, but whatever. You won't need to pay for the skins for your weapons, you won't need to suffer from the awful sounds which were invented in csgo. If you wanna play old, good Counter-Strike - you should get this game(Or you can also get yourself CS 1.6).

Counter-Strike: Source or CSS is the sequel to the best fps game of the year, Counter-Strike. People who wanted another game to continue the game should be excited for this, as coming as far as custom mods, weapon skins , glove skins and playermodel's this game is the best, and i really hope you do buy this game on sale or full price. Ether way, you'll spend hour's playing this game with friends, other people... or bots. This game has gotten a Recommended from me and many other people. 7/5
